tool_description: Creates detailed profiles of product return patterns, identifying high-return products, categories, and associated reasons.

return_ids.description: List of return transaction IDs to analyze

grouping_level.description: Level of product grouping: sku, category, brand, department

min_return_threshold.description: Minimum number of returns required to include in profile (1-100)

include_reasons.description: Whether to include return reason analysis

error_messages: Invalid grouping level: Use one of [sku, category, brand, department]
Invalid threshold: min_return_threshold must be between 1 and 100
Invalid sort criteria: Use one of [return_count, return_rate, refund_amount]
No products meet criteria: No products found with returns above the minimum threshold
usage: Provide return_ids and grouping_level to analyze product return patterns. Set min_return_threshold to filter products and choose sort_by criteria for ranking.

top_returned_products.description: List of products with highest return rates or counts

product_insights.description: Key insights about product return patterns
